scripts.local:start: concurrently "bun run local:plugin" "bun run local:admin" "bun run local:api" "bun run local:ui"
scripts.local:stop: cd wp-plugin && docker compose down && cd .. && killall -15 bun
scripts.dev:start: concurrently "bun run dev:admin" "bun run dev:api" "bun run dev:ui"
scripts.prod:start: concurrently "bun run prod:admin" "bun run prod:api" "bun run prod:ui"
scripts.build: concurrently "bun run build:admin" "bun run build:api" "bun run build:ui"
scripts.install:all: cd loyal-rev-admin-panel && bun install && cd ../loyal-rev-api && bun install && cd ../loyal-rev-UI-integration && bun install
scripts.cleanup:all: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf loyal-rev-admin-panel/node_modules && rm -rf loyal-rev-api/node_modules && rm -rf loyal-rev-UI-integration/node_modules && rm -rf loyal-rev-admin-panel/.next && rm -rf loyal-rev-api/.next && rm -rf loyal-rev-UI-integration/.next && rm -rf loyal-rev-admin-panel/dist && rm -rf loyal-rev-api/dist && rm -rf loyal-rev-UI-integration/dist
scripts.cleanup:ui: rm -rf loyal-rev-UI-integration/node_modules && rm -rf loyal-rev-UI-integration/.next && rm -rf loyal-rev-UI-integration/dist
scripts.cleanup:admin: rm -rf loyal-rev-admin-panel/node_modules && rm -rf loyal-rev-admin-panel/.next && rm -rf loyal-rev-admin-panel/dist
scripts.cleanup:api: rm -rf loyal-rev-api/node_modules && rm -rf loyal-rev-api/.next && rm -rf loyal-rev-api/dist
